def_en: A kit is a group of items that are kept together, often in the same container, because they are all used for similar purposes.

def_cn: （尤指某运动的）全套衣服和装备
def_en: Kit is special clothing and equipment that you use when you take part in a particular activity, especially a sport.
A kit is a set of parts that can be put together in order to make something.

def_cn: 脱掉所有衣服/不脱掉所有衣服
def_en: If someone gets their kit off or takes their kit off, they take off all their clothes. If they keep their kit on, they do not take off all their clothes, even though people may be expecting them to.
